meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one million hertz.
meanings.sent1: My old radio can only pick up signals in the megahertzes range.
meanings.sent2: The technician adjusted the equipment to measure frequencies in megahertzes.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could hear music in megahertzes; it would be like having a secret radio station!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like megahertzes bouncing off walls.
meanings.sent5: The hum of the machine was so high-pitched, it felt like megahertzes buzzing in my ears.

meanings.definition: The unit of frequency equal to one million cycles per second.
meanings.sent1: The computer processor operates at incredible speeds measured in megahertzes.
meanings.sent2: The megahertzes of the microwave oven determine how quickly it heats food.
meanings.sent3: If I could run as fast as megahertzes, I'd be the fastest person alive!
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the room was palpable, vibrating at megahertzes of anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the crowd cheering reached a crescendo, like megahertzes building up to a powerful wave.
